评论概述: Great fabric quality - needs a wash
评论详情: Big pockets and adjustable straps, what more can I ask for? The fit is great but when it arrived, it smelled BAD and had a weird texture. After a wash and line dry (I would not use heat), the smell and texture went away. Warehouse smudge I guess.

I did not like the fact that about 2 months after buying these, the metal piece that keeps the straps hooked on the buttons, fell off. Now I can't use the overalls at all! I will not be buying anything with this brand!

I am 5'2" 140lb and the L fit well but with all the shrinking comments it won't after washing. I will return because the fabric is heavy, stiff  and will shrink. It also does not drape well on the body. Oh, and it does not stretch as AI tells us it does.

This is a unique and different style for me. The first on git - but I was hoping for a bit more room so I exchanged for the next size up. It’s radically different from anything I wear - but I LIKE it! Comfortable, casual, great for travel.

Honestly this is my favorite thing I own. So far I've bought them in three colors and plan on buying more. They are great in the warmer months and I've found that if you wear knee high socks with a long sleeved top, they're warm in the colder months. It's also cute to throw a sweater over the top of it. I'm 5' 5.5" and 132lbs and ordered the Small. I maybe could have gone with the XS, but didn't want them to be any shorter since they are already cropped. I hang mine to dry because I don't want them to shrink at all. And when you're bloated, they are the best!

评论概述: I have 2 in diff colors now!
评论详情: Super comfy, wear it almost every day along with my black one. There has def been some discoloration and a bit of a shrinkage too but nothing major. One of my favs!
Great for the price. Lasted a few years then the strap broke. Worth the money. A ton of compliments and you can wear out or for doing yard/house work
I’ve had mine for a while and forgot to review them. Initially I loved them but each time they get washed they shrink. I’ve tried cold wash, hang dry, dry cleaning ect. They always shrink
Love them. I am 4’11” 125lbs and I got a small. The length is to my ankles. Perfect fit.

I’ve bought these in 3 different colors because I love them so much. Comfortable but still flattering! I ordered them in XXL but probably could have gotten away with an XL. But size up if you like them extra roomy! :)

I love these overalls.  I bought them in purple which is a nice saturated grape color. The fabric is like a mid-weight broad cloth.  Washes and dries nicely. The pockets are deep and functional. The legs are very wide. At first glance it looks like a sundress. The torso hangs neatly and is not baggy. The sides are cut very deep so an inch or two of skin shows on the sides. (Just a peek. Nothing inappropriate for a “grown up”.) The bib provides nice front coverage. During the summer I wore them with  a bandeau top or bralette/halter type top. When the weather turned cool, I wore them with a long-sleeve T-shirt. These overalls are so cute they can easily go from the garden to running weekend errands with sandals or sneakers.
I ordered a small and the legs were above my ankles. Super short and not like the picture
This fits true to size and is super comfy! but its a weird texture of fabric which has led me to not wear it as often as I wanted to.
Runs smaller than indicated and cheap looking as well.

类型: Size: SmallColor: A-blue Gray-split Wide Leg
评论详情: I really like this brand.  I have gotten several items from them.  This jumpsuit is adorable and comfortable.  Great sized pockets too!  I get complemented every single time I wear these.  They wash well and have kept their size.  I recommend for sure.  Great price too.

I'm 5'1 and usually these are really long on me but this one fit great and wasn't dragging on the ground even barefoot. It hit at my ankles. I normally wear a medium but I sized down to a small so that might have made the difference. It is comfortable and the material is great. It's not paper thin.

This is very true to color It is so cute on although Amazon told me to go with an XL. And i'm returning it for a large, it's very comfortable and not material that will soften and cling to you better than when you first get it, it's a little stiff. I already have black and I love it so much. I get so many compliments I got another color these were also really cute cut in the longer shorts
Quality, cute.  I’m lumpy and hard to fit.  These look cute on me.  I think they’d look cute on anyone.
Got lots of compliments from passersby. Comfortable. Nice price too

I originally found these at a thrift store and wore them till they were ruined, had no idea who made these or anything but after a ton of searching I finally found them again and these are the exact same. Can’t wait to wear these all the time again. Thor anyone wondering the material has no stretch and if you like them baggy size up, the material is thick and high quality. the straps are adjustable and come with extra adjusters if one breaks over time. As an artist, I highly recommend these. So comfortable
Fits just right
Runs at least two sizes too small.

I've been struggling to find a romper/jumpsuit that isn't too long, will accommodate a bigger booty & isn't too tight or awkward looking in the crotch area, but this fit all the criteria! It's so cute and flattering. The fabric feels really nice and kind of heavy/higher quality without being too thick. The color is great and it was really comfy. I'd buy more of these in other colors. I'm 5'4 and typically size 16, and this fit great. It's a tiny bit long but with platform sandals or boots it's perfect - definitely not as long as most of the ones I've tried on before. Super cute with a crop top but it's nice enough quality to be dressed up a bit too.
Fits good and washes up good
Love the fabric. Made well and was true to size

Super cute and I always get compliments when I wear these. Color is rich and looks high quality. I wear with a tank top to dress down, and up style with a wrap or shrug. Fit well. I wash in a laundry mesh bag and hang to dry. I'm 5'4' and 135 and ordered a medium which fit great.

I love this. Stress has caused weight gain and nothing is comfortable right now. I saw this and it looked cute and comfortable and not binding anywhere! It turned out to be exactly what I needed. Comfortable and fun to wear. Many compliments too!

this is SO cute!! material is not too light and not too thick it’s a perfect linen. I will definitely wear this in the spring time too.  not too stretchy so if you like more wiggle room I would recommend sizing up. I’m 5’4 250lbs and got a 3x. I could have definitely gotten a 2x and would have been fine too. all preference!
This is a super cute jumper, however .... even with washing in cold water and air drying it shrunk.  I can not wear it now.  So sad, because it is really cute!

评论概述: Absolutely love these! Must buy! Stop debating and order it 😅
评论详情: I absolutely love these jumpers. They are thick enough to hide your body, but don’t make you hot. They are seriously adorable. When I was 145 I got a large and am 5”2. They give that perfect drape and give and are so cute with a white shirt or tank top and a neutral brown cross body and braided brown sandals. I get SO many compliments every time I wear them. I am currently 169 and 23 weeks pregnant and have been wearing them with a long cardigan during winter. I will be able to wear them my whole pregnancy with the give it has. If you want that cozy artistic vibe, get the right size. I don’t like mine super tight. From the left one in the picture it is the coffee, which is a beautiful rich burnt orange and is not like this pink orange you may see in some photos that can throw you off on which one to get if you’re looking for a deep burnt orange color. The middle is the camel and I thought it was more of a tan, but reminds me of a cappuccino color. It’s really pretty and neutral. The other one I have to the right, I can’t remember the color, but it’s like a mustard color.  Cannot recommend these enough. They hold up SO well being dried in the dryer and don’t shrink either. I have a dark pea green one too not in the photos and love it. Can’t recommend enough!
I sized up two sizes for a looser fit

评论概述: Baggy jumpsuit that is the PERFECT length

评论概述: It's not flattering for women with curves..m
评论详情: Not flattering. The straps are very thin. The shape of the garment is square and does not conform to a woman's body. It's suited for skinny women and no curves. Its a piece of cloth  cut in a square. The chest area is not tapered and is not flushed with the waist.
This is absolutely adorable and seems like good quality. Item runs small, so ORDER TWO SIZES UP if you want the “baggy” look like the models. Great choice, will order in more colors!

Comfy. I'm 5'6' and 155 lbs. The pants come to just at/below the ankle. It did not shrink with washing but I was careful. I put it in the dryer for about 5 min to get a few wrinkles out and then hung to dry. The side pockets are in the seam and lay flat. The fabric is relatively light weight but I will wear during the winter.

These are so comfortable,easy to travel and walk far places in.  I love the gray the mustard color I'm still getting used to but it pairs nicely with black or white.  I'm giving a 4 star because of the fact that they wrinkle quite easily.  Wish I could find some that didn't wrinkle that were as comfortable.I am 5'4 and 190lbs and ordered a 2xl but could have home down to xl, but l like them loose.  They do tend to run a little bit long on my 5'4" height. But overall I do like the longer for fall and spring.

I thought these would be soft cotton, but the material is stiff. Not as comfortable as I hoped. Will be returning.

评论概述: Mostly like but they are a foot too long
评论详情: It's rather ridiculous how long these are, pulled up ALL the way, as short as they can be, still need 6 inches chopped off. I'm 5'2 for reference.  However, fantastic fabric, and overall fit is ok--I wish these were the style with some gathering in front, on a yoke, but they will do, especially because this is the best fabric I have found for these.  The length of the legs is insane, and the straps are so long, I also have to shorten them. I do not like making repairs to brand new clothing, you should be able to wear something without practically remaking it.  Please consider a shorter pattern, shorter legs, and the ability to make the straps even shorter.

评论概述: Mostly positive…it’s a good quality piece
评论详情: I sized up to a M since my thighs and hips are wide. Unfortunately, since my shoulders and chest are on the slimmer side, the straps aren’t comfortable, even when I adjust them. It’s cute, and mostly functional, but I can’t stand the straps sitting on the points of my shoulders.  The positives: The fabric is sturdy, and provides good coverage, yet is comfortable. The pockets are better than a lot of women’s clothing, and they’ll fit my iphone se. The color is beautiful, and the style is very cute.  I will attempt to add a couple darts to the top to improve the fit. But otherwise, this jumpsuit is just for around the house.

For reference, I’m 5’7 and weigh 217 lbs.  I buy all my clothing based off of my measurements and the XL fits perfectly. The length hits just below my ankles. I love it.But I love them, they are comfy and one of my favorite things to wear. Very flowy and the material feels durable.  I've washed them once with no shrinkage at all.I highly recommend

For the all the thick & delicious ladies purchasing one for yourself. Size up one or two sizes. The size chart shows 22/24 being 3x but now that I’ve tried mine on, I’m sending it back for 5x. My body is thick around the middle/ass heavy and 3x is ok standing but sitting is skin snug (not seam splitting tight), no give & something tells me this is going to shrink after a wash.  The legs are HUGE!!!!!! I’ll probably need to have the legs altered going up in size but that’s exactly why I’m purchasing this is for the ease around my middle.  If you’re a slim size 22/24 the 3x I imagine will fit comfortably & wear super cute.  🙂✌️

I had low expectations but was pleasantly surprised. They don't have any stretch but they are true to size, flattering and comfortable
Great material, great fit! One of the few clothes I recommend from Amazon.

评论概述: True to Size - See Full Review
评论详情: I read all the reviews and looked at as many photos and videos as I could for plus size.  I typically wear 2XL men’s T-Shirt and Torrid 3XL Leggings. Torrid Dresses 2X/3X depending on material and style. I’m 5’8 and weigh 243. Most of my weight is in my mid section.  I ordered a 3XL. I love the way it fits but it definitely doesn’t have stretch because of the type of material. If I bend over or sit down, it feels a little more snug than what I prefer. I would have preferred a 4XL probably.  If you want more of a baggy/comfortable fit, I would suggest sizing up 1 size compared to what you usually wear.

I love these! They are comfortable on me but there is not a lot of room for an undershirt to go with these. I would recommend  anyone who likes the “bib look” to order these. If you like your bibs baggy, you may want to order 1 size above normal.

These overalls are stylish lightweight and comfortable. The size was a little smaller for me but I am extra hippy so I don’t blame the product. The length is perfect to wear with flats or a boot with a heel. There are no buttons just a metal adjustable shoulder clasp. It does wrinkle but not terribly. It’s so comfortable to wear.
Wife ordered this to wear as overalls with a jacket on top and it looks great. Its light weight and baggy. She loves it and has had no problems.

Bought these for my DIL. She loves them. Her third pair.

honestly a great deal, i love the way it looks nobody would suspect its from amazon. i was already a litttttle tall for it so when it shrunk in the dryer that sucked. id recommend hang drying

Perfect

I'm a big fan of linen clothing, especially when traveling overseas! This is better than I expected! It's perfect all-year round. Wear it with a black or white crop top tank or baby tee! During the winter it's perfect with a fitted long-sleeve shirt under and a plaid shacket. Birks or some classic tennis shoes.. either match it!  Ya'll - the straps are adjustable AND IT HAS POCKETS!!!  This is the Dark Army Green and came exactly as I expected.

The cutest jumper. Great material- not too thick for summer and not too thin for cooler weather. Works well in the fall with a light cardigan or denim jacket and tolerable with a tank top in 90°. Washes a little softer than it arrived. Did not dry it, probably won't to keep integrity. Like linen, it expands and grows as you wear it throughout the day so after combing through all the reviews, I went with size small. I'm 5'7", 165lbs, 38C. These are cropped on me (depending on how I adjust the shoulder straps, they're pretty much always above my ankles.) They are quite wide which I ended up really liking. Olive & Camel colors are perfect all year round, in my opinion.  Updated 11/24: I did end up drying all of them and they did shrink more in length so now they're more like Culottes but I'm ok with that. Due to the linen-like material, it still "grew" width-wise as the day progressed. I might try an XSmall next time and not dry them but I think they'd just be way too short for my 5'7" frame.

I feel they are true to size and I was on cold to avoid shrink, they do a bit from the dryer but the fabric does stretch back out easily with wear

I own this romper in several colors and keep buying them because I get so many compliments. The fabric feels great, the colors are wonderful and I have been able to wear them with simple tank tops, as well as short sleeve and even long sleeve tops. They look good under a button down used as a topper and also shorter kimono toppers. I usually wear them straight out of the dryer. I'm 5'2", 145 lbs, 36DD and the size XL fits roomy but not too much. I could go size L but I like an exaggerated baggy fit.
